Smart Hanger: A coat hanger with built-in sensors and AI technology that can detect the type of garment hung on it and provide personalized suggestions for styling and organization.
Air-Dry Hanger: A coat hanger with a built-in air dryer that can quickly and efficiently dry wet garments without needing to be plugged in.
Smart Mirror Hanger: A coat hanger with a built-in mirror that can provide a full-body view of the wearer, allowing them to check their reflection and make adjustments on the fly.
Personalized Hanger: A coat hanger that can recognize the wearer's personal style and suggest coordinating outfits based on their preferences.
Hanger with Built-in Lights: A coat hanger with built-in LED lights that can provide a soft, warm glow in the closet, making it easier to find and organize clothes in the dark.
